summary: Frontend-only testing completed for SinAdicciones app. All key features tested: Profile with 5 expandable sections, Habits list, and Emotional history with emojis and stats. Dark theme verified across all screens.

issues: Bar chart shows Y-axis scale (0-10) but no visible bars displayed for the last 7 days despite 30 total registros being available. This could be because recent_logs data may not contain entries from the last 7 days.

action_items: Verify bar chart data population in emotional stats - check if recent_logs contains actual entries within last 7 days
context_for_next_testing_agent: Authentication works via localStorage.setItem('session_token', 'sess_21ac7f90b0d14f9b9563bdfd758b517f'). Manual login does not work in Playwright. Direct URL navigation works: /profile, /habits, /emotional. All profile expandable sections tested and working.
